TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataProtector extends System.Object

summary.span: 為資料保護裝置提供基底類別。

span.span: Provides the base class for data protectors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會儲存的資料保護檢視和竄改。This class protects stored data from viewing and tampering. 受保護資料的存取被透過建立這個類別的執行個體，並使用正確的目的字串用來保護資料。The access to the protected data is obtained by creating an instance of this class and using the exact purpose strings that were used to protect the data. 呼叫端不需要保護，或是取消保護資料的索引鍵。The caller does not need a key to either protect or unprotect the data. 加密演算法所提供的金鑰。The key is provided by the encryption algorithm. 在衍生的類別必須覆寫和方法，其中基底類別呼叫回。Derived classes must override the and methods, which the base class calls back into. 它們也必須覆寫方法，可以傳回`true`與潛在喪失些微的效率，當應用程式重新整理其資料庫的預存的加密文字。They must also override the method, which can always return `true` with a potential small loss of efficiency when applications refresh their database of stored cipher text. 衍生的類別必須提供的建構函式呼叫基底類別建構函式，設定， ，和屬性。Derived classes should provide a constructor that calls the base class constructor, which sets the , , and properties. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立資料的選項會使用保護類別的額外 entropy 的保護裝置。The following example demonstrates how to create a data protector that uses a protection class with an option for extra entropy. 根據預設，類別前面加上用途屬性，以加密資料的雜湊。By default, the class prepends the hash of the purpose properties to the data to be encrypted. 您可以關閉該功能，並呼叫的額外 entropy 選項，將資料保護裝置時，使用雜湊的用途為額外的 entropy。You can turn that functionality off and use the hashed purpose as extra entropy when calling a data protector with an extra entropy option. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.DataProtector#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.dataprotector/cs/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.DataProtector#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.dataprotector/vb/class1.vb#1)] 下列範例會示範簡單資料保護裝置使用功能類別。The following example demonstrates a simple data protector that uses the functionality of the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.MemoryProtector#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.memoryprotector/cs/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.MemoryProtector#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.memoryprotector/vb/class1.vb#1)]

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class by using the provided application name, primary purpose, and specific purposes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定， ，和屬性。This constructor sets the , , and properties. 這三個屬性的組合必須唯一識別您要保護的資料。The combination of these three properties must uniquely identify the data you are protecting. 如果無法唯一識別資料，您可能會不小心讀取錯誤的資料，或其他資料可能會取代為您自己。If the data is not uniquely identified, you might inadvertently read the wrong data, or other data might be substituted for yours. 主要和特定目的配對的範例是 「 發票 」 和發票號碼、"禮品卡 」 和禮品卡號、 「 密碼 」 和 URL 字串。Examples of primary and specific purpose pairs are "invoice" and invoice number, "gift card" and gift card number, "password" and URL string.

summary.span: 建立建構函式所指定之屬性值的雜湊。

span.span: Creates a hash of the property values specified by the constructor.

returns.span: 包含 、 及 屬性之雜湊的位元組陣列。

span.span: An array of bytes that contain the hash of the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算的雜湊的應用程式名稱和完整的用途。 computes the hash of the application name and the full purpose. 完整的目的是串連所有和屬性。The full purpose is a concatenation of all the and properties. 每三個部分前面加上其長度以便能夠反轉雜湊。Each of the three parts is prefaced with its length so the hash can be reversed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用雜湊做為額外的 entropy 的用途屬性的方法。The following example shows how to use the method to hash the purpose properties for use as extra entropy. 它是針對較大的程式碼範例的一部分類別。It is part of a larger code example for the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.DataProtector#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.dataprotector/cs/class1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.DataProtector#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.dataprotector/vb/class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual bool PrependHashedPurposeToPlaintext { get; }
.property instance bool PrependHashedPurposeToPlaintext
Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property PrependHashedPurposeToPlaintext As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool PrependHashedPurposeToPlaintext { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指定是否已在加密前將雜湊預先附加至文字陣列。

span.span: Specifies whether the hash is prepended to the text array before encryption.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，它會假設衍生的類別會在前面加上的雜湊， ，和屬性以純文字加密，並將之前檢查和驗證雜湊期間解密。By default, it is assumed that derived classes will prepend the hash of the , , and properties to the plain text before encryption, and will check and verify the hash during decryption. 如果想要自行指定預留的資料的衍生的類別 （例如做為選擇性的熵值），這個屬性可以覆寫而設定為傳回`false`。If a derived class wants to specify the prepended data on its own (for example as an optional entropy value), this property can be overridden and set to return `false`. 如果是`false`，和直接傳遞給和會覆寫，而不需變更的位元組陣列。If is `false`, and passes directly through to the and overrides without altering the byte array.
